segments.text: Good afternoon . I suppose you are Ms . Monica . My name is Mr . Thomas , the general manager of ABC Company . Here is my business card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very impressed by your resume . Therefore , I am very interested to know why you ’ re willing to leave your current company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am looking for a more challenging position . I can ’ t grow anymore in my current job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I understand . But why you choose us to work for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have studied carefully the information about your company on the internet and I have checked your company ’ s homepage . I am impressed by the company . And I like the products a lot . Since you ’ re growing steadily , I would be very eager to help you to improve your accounting system .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you work with a team ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I work quite well with a team . I ’ m a good team player . I respect people , cooperate well with member ’ s team . And I will do my best to help team members .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s your long term goal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to bring to ABC Company not only my technical skills , ambition , enthusiasm , but also my loyalty , a sensor desire to become an administrative assistant . It is the hardest of my career plans .
segments.speaker: S2
